segments.text: Mom , I want to get a motorcycle . Is that all right with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean a murder cycle ? Did you know more cyclists die in accidents than motorists ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom ! I'll wear a helmet and I'll drive sane . I promise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll tell you what . You can get a motorcycle on one condition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You spend two weeks with dad in his ambulance as an EMT trainee and volunteer at the emergency room for one month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After that , we'll let you decide if you still want a murder , I mean motorcycle .
segments.speaker: S2
